text: Rosalind Louise Smyth CBE (born 28 September 1958) is Director of the UCL Great Ormond Street Institute of Child Health and Professor of Child Health at UCL. == Early life == She was born in Belfast, Northern Ireland and attended Down High School.http://www.thedownrecorder.co.uk/pages/?title=Newcastle_woman_who_became_one_of_UK%92s_top_kids%92_doctors She went on to study at Clare College, Cambridge University (BA 1980; MA 1984) and Westminster Medical School, University of London (MB BS 1983). == Career == She trained in paediatrics in London, Cambridge (MD 1993) and Liverpool. Until September 2012, she was Professor of Paediatric Medicine in at the University of Liverpool and Executive Director of Liverpool Health Partners. From 2005 to 2012 she was Director of the NIHR Medicines for Children Research Network, which supported all clinical research with children in England. She is a Fellow and former Council member of the Academy of Medical Sciences (UK). She was a clinical medicine sub-panel member of the 2008 Research Assessment Exercise and the 2014 Research Evaluation Framework and numerous grant awarding bodies. She was a member of the Medicine and Healthcare Products Regulatory Agency's Commission on Human Medicines (2009–2013) and chaired its Paediatric Medicines Expert Advisory Group (2002–13).http://citeseerx.ist.psu.edu/viewdoc/download;jsessionid=1F6C741BD082726A83A0E844AC6FC530?doi=10.1.1.432.1708&rep;=rep1&type;=pdf She was appointed a CBE in the Queen's New Year's Honours list in 2015 for services to the regulation drugs for children.https://www.ucl.ac.uk/ich/news/ich-news-publication/prof-smyth-cbe- honour She has a strong commitment to Open Access publishing and was a Director of the Public Library of Science 2006–2016.https://web.archive.org/web/20100609030158/http://www.plos.org/about/board.php She is a Governor and Trustee of the Health Foundation (2016)http://www.health.org.uk/our-people/board-governors/professor-rosalind- smyth-cbe-fmedsci and will chair the MRC's Clinical Careers and Training Committee from April 2017. == Honours == Fellow of the Academy of Medical Sciences (2006);http://www.acmedsci.ac.uk/fellows/fellows-directory/ordinary- fellows/professor-rosalind-smyth/ NIHR Senior Investigator (2008), Fellow (Honorary) of the Faculty of Pharmaceutical Medicine (2010), Fellow of the European Respiratory Society (2014),https://www.ersnet.org/the-society/who-we- are/fellow-of-ers Commander of the Order of the British Empire (CBE) for services to the regulation of medicines for children (2015). == Selected publications == *Taylor-Robinson DC, Whitehead M, Diggle PJ, Smyth RL.
